content:
TITLE: Basic React Datepicker Implementation Example
DESCRIPTION: A basic implementation of the React Datepicker component showing how to import, implement state management, and use the component with required CSS imports.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import React, { useState } from "react";
import DatePicker from "react-datepicker";

import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css";

// CSS Modules, react-datepicker-cssmodules.css
// import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker-cssmodules.css';

const Example = () => {
  const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date());
  return <DatePicker selected={startDate} onChange={(date) => setStartDate(date)} />;
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Minimal React Datepicker Implementation
DESCRIPTION: The most basic implementation of a React Datepicker component showing the required props for functionality: selected date and onChange handler.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
<DatePicker selected={startdate} onChange={(date) => setStartDate(date)} />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: React DatePicker Props Schema
DESCRIPTION: A markdown table defining the complete props interface for the DatePicker component, including prop names, types, default values, and descriptions. Covers accessibility props, styling options, date configuration, and behavior controls.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/datepicker.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| name                         | type                           | default value   | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------ | --------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `allowSameDay`               | `bool`                         | `false`         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `ariaDescribedBy`            | `string`                       | `null`          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `ariaInvalid`                | `string`                       | `null`          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `ariaLabelledBy`             | `string`                       | `null`          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `ariaRequired`               | `string`                       | `null`          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `autoComplete`               | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `autoFocus`                  | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `calendarClassName`          | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `children`                   | `node`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `className`                  | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `clearButtonTitle`           | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `clearButtonClassName`       | `string`                       |                 | Customize the clear button                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `customInput`                | `element`                      |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `customInputRef`             | `string`                       | `'ref'`         | The property used to pass the ref callback                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `dateFormat`                 | `union(string\|array)`         | `'MM/dd/yyyy'`  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `dateFormatCalendar`         | `string`                       | `'LLLL yyyy'`   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `dayClassName`               | `func`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `weekDayClassName`           | `func`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `yearClassName`              | `func`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `disabled`                   | `bool`                         | `false`         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `disabledKeyboardNavigation` | `bool`                         | `false`         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `dropdownMode` (required)    | `enum('scroll'\|'select')`     | `'scroll'`      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `endDate`                    | `instanceOf(Date)`             |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: React Datepicker with Time Picker Integration
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to enable the time picker functionality in the DatePicker component using the showTimeSelect prop and setting an appropriate date format to display time.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
<DatePicker selected={date} onChange={handleDateChange} showTimeSelect dateFormat="Pp" />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: React Datepicker with onSelect Event Handler
DESCRIPTION: Implementation showing how to use both onSelect (fires when a day is clicked) and onChange (fires only when the value changes) event handlers with the DatePicker component.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
<DatePicker
  selected={date}
  onSelect={handleDateSelect} //when day is clicked
  onChange={handleDateChange} //only when value has changed
/>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Localizing React Datepicker
DESCRIPTION: Code example demonstrating how to implement localization in the DatePicker by importing and registering a locale from date-fns and setting it as a prop on the component.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { registerLocale, setDefaultLocale } from  "react-datepicker";
import { es } from 'date-fns/locale/es';
registerLocale('es', es)

<DatePicker
  locale="es"
/>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: React DatePicker Props Table
DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing props configuration for React DatePicker including prop names, types, default values, and descriptions. Key props include date selection controls, display options, time selection features, and portal configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/datepicker.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| `selectsStart`               | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `shouldCloseOnSelect`        | `bool`                         | `true`          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `showMonthDropdown`          | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `showTimeSelect`             | `bool`                         | `false`         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `showWeekNumbers`            | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `showYearDropdown`           | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `startDate`                  | `instanceOf(Date)`             |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `startOpen`                  | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `tabIndex`                   | `number`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `timeClassName`              | `func`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `timeFormat`                 | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `timeIntervals`              | `number`                       | `30`            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `title`                      | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `todayButton`                | `node`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `useWeekdaysShort`           | `bool`                         |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `utcOffset`                  | `union(number\|string)`        |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `value`                      | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `weekLabel`                  | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `withPortal`                 | `bool`                         | `false`         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `portalId`                   | `string`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `portalHost`                 | `instanceOf(ShadowRoot)`       |                 | When set, portals will be attached to this ShadowRoot instead of the document body.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `wrapperClassName`           | `string`                       |
|                              |
| `yearItemNumber`             | `number`                       | `12`            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `yearDropdownItemNumber`     | `number`                       |                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `icon`                       | `string` or `element`          |                 | Allows using a custom calendar icon. Accepts a string (icon class name) or a React component (e.g., custom SVG). If a string is passed, an `<i>` element is rendered with that string as its class name. If a React component is passed, it is rendered as-is.                                                       |
| `calendarIconClassname`      | `string`                       |                 | this props is deprecated. should use calendarIconClassName props.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documenting React DatePicker Properties in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: A markdown table listing the properties of the React DatePicker component, including their names, types, default values, and descriptions. This documentation covers a wide range of configuration options for customizing the DatePicker's behavior and appearance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/index.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# `index` (component)

| name                            | type | default value      | description |
| ------------------------------- | ---- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `allowSameDay`                  |      | `false`            |             |
| `ariaDescribedBy`               |      |                    |             |
| `ariaInvalid`                   |      |                    |             |
| `ariaLabelClose`                |      |                    |             |
| `ariaLabelledBy`                |      |                    |             |
| `ariaRequired`                  |      |                    |             |
| `autoComplete`                  |      |                    |             |
| `autoFocus`                     |      |                    |             |
| `calendarClassName`             |      |                    |             |
| `calendarContainer`             |      |                    |             |
| `calendarIconClassName`         |      |                    |             |
| `calendarIconClassname`         |      |                    |             |
| `calendarStartDay`              |      | `undefined`        |             |
| `className`                     |      |                    |             |
| `clearButtonClassName`          |      |                    |             |
| `clearButtonTitle`              |      |                    |             |
| `closeOnScroll`                 |      |                    |             |
| `customInput`                   |      |                    |             |
| `customInputRef`                |      |                    |             |
| `customTimeInput`               |      | `null`             |             |
| `dateFormat`                    |      | `"MM/dd/yyyy"`     |             |
| `dateFormatCalendar`            |      | `"LLLL yyyy"`      |             |
| `disabled`                      |      | `false`            |             |
| `disabledKeyboardNavigation`    |      | `false`            |             |
| `dropdownMode`                  |      | `"scroll"`         |             |
| `enableTabLoop`                 |      | `true`             |             |
| `endDate`                       |      |                    |             |
| `excludeScrollbar`              |      | `true`             |             |
| `focusSelectedMonth`            |      | `false`            |             |
| `form`                          |      |                    |             |
| `highlightDates`                |      |                    |             |
| `holidays`                      |      |                    |             |
| `id`                            |      |                    |             |
| `isClearable`                   |      |                    |             |
| `monthsShown`                   |      | `1`                |             |
| `name`                          |      |                    |             |
| `nextMonthAriaLabel`            |      | `"Next Month"`     |             |
| `nextMonthButtonLabel`          |      | `"Next Month"`     |             |
| `nextYearAriaLabel`             |      | `"Next Year"`      |             |
| `nextYearButtonLabel`           |      | `"Next Year"`      |             |
| `onBlur`                        |      |                    |             |
| `onCalendarClose`               |      |                    |             |
| `onCalendarOpen`                |      |                    |             |
| `onChangeRaw`                   |      |                    |             |
| `onClickOutside`                |      |                    |             |
| `onFocus`                       |      |                    |             |
| `onInputClick`                  |      |                    |             |
| `onInputError`                  |      |                    |             |
| `onKeyDown`                     |      |                    |             |
| `onSelect`                      |      |                    |             |
| `open`                          |      |                    |             |
| `placeholderText`               |      |                    |             |
| `popperClassName`               |      |                    |             |
| `preventOpenOnFocus`            |      | `false`            |             |
| `previousMonthAriaLabel`        |      | `"Previous Month"` |             |
| `previousMonthButtonLabel`      |      | `"Previous Month"` |             |
| `previousYearAriaLabel`         |      | `"Previous Year"`  |             |
| `previousYearButtonLabel`       |      | `"Previous Year"`  |             |
| `readOnly`                      |      | `false`            |             |
| `required`                      |      |                    |             |
| `selected`                      |      |                    |             |
| `selectsDisabledDaysInRange`    |      | `false`            |             |
| `shouldCloseOnSelect`           |      | `true`             |             |
| `showDateSelect`                |      |                    |             |
| `showFourColumnMonthYearPicker` |      | `false`            |             |
| `showFullMonthYearPicker`       |      | `false`            |             |
| `showIcon`                      |      |                    |             |
| `showMonthYearPicker`           |      | `false`            |             |
| `showPopperArrow`               |      | `true`             |             |
| `showPreviousMonths`            |      | `false`            |             |
| `showQuarterYearPicker`         |      | `false`            |             |
| `showTimeInput`                 |      | `false`            |             |
| `showTimeSelect`                |      | `false`            |             |
| `showTwoColumnMonthYearPicker`  |      | `false`            |             |
| `showWeekPicker`                |      | `false`            |             |
| `showYearPicker`                |      | `false`            |             |
| `startDate`                     |      |                    |             |
| `startOpen`                     |      |                    |             |
| `strictParsing`                 |      | `false`            |             |
| `swapRange`                     |      | `false`            |             |
| `tabIndex`                      |      |                    |             |
| `timeCaption`                   |      | `"Time"`           |             |
| `timeInputLabel`                |      | `"Time"`           |             |
| `timeIntervals`                 |      | `30`               |             |
| `title`                         |      |                    |             |
| `toggleCalendarOnIconClick`     |      | `false`            |             |
| `usePointerEvent`               |      | `false`            |             |
| `value`                         |      |                    |             |
| `withPortal`                    |      | `false`            |             |
| `yearItemNumber`                |      | `12`               |             |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing InputTime Component in React
DESCRIPTION: Example usage of the InputTime component showing basic implementation with a time string prop. The component accepts various props including onChange handler, date value, time string, time input label, and custom time input element.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/input_time.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<InputTime timeString="12:00" />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing React Datepicker with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the React Datepicker package via npm package manager. This adds the component to your project dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install react-datepicker --save
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing React Datepicker with yarn
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the React Datepicker package via yarn package manager. This adds the component to your project dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn add react-datepicker
```

TITLE: React DatePicker Popper Component Props Table
DESCRIPTION: Markdown table defining the available props for the popper_component, including their types and default values. The component handles popper positioning, portal hosting, and wrapper customization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/popper_component.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| name               | type                           | default value    | description |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------ | ---------------- | ----------- |
| `className`        | `string`                       |                  |             |
| `enableTabLoop`    | `bool`                         |                  |             |
| `hidePopper`       | `bool`                         | `true`           |             |
| `popperComponent`  | `element`                      |                  |             |
| `popperContainer`  | `func`                         |                  |             |
| `popperModifiers`  | `arrayOf[object Object]`       | `[]`             |             |
| `popperOnKeyDown`  | `func`                         |                  |             |
| `popperPlacement`  | `enumpopperPlacementPositions` | `"bottom-start"` |             |
| `popperProps`      | `object`                       | `{}`             |             |
| `portalHost`       | `instanceOfShadowRoot`         |                  |             |
| `portalId`         | `string`                       |                  |             |
| `targetComponent`  | `element`                      |                  |             |
| `wrapperClassName` | `string`                       |                  |             |
```

TITLE: Time Component Props Table in Markdown

SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/time.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# `time` (component)

| name                 | type | default value | description |
| -------------------- | ---- | ------------- | ----------- |
| `format`             |      |               |             |
| `handleOnKeyDown`    |      |               |             |
| `injectTimes`        |      |               |             |
| `intervals`          |      | `30`          |             |
| `locale`             |      |               |             |
| `monthRef`           |      |               |             |
| `onChange`           |      |               |             |
| `openToDate`         |      |               |             |
| `selected`           |      |               |             |
| `showTimeCaption`    |      | `true`        |             |
| `showTimeSelectOnly` |      |               |             |
| `timeCaption`        |      | `"Time"`      |             |
| `timeClassName`      |      |               |             |
| `todayButton`        |      | `null`        |             |
```

TITLE: Documenting React-DatePicker Props in Markdown Table
DESCRIPTION: This markdown table documents three props of the React-DatePicker component: calendarIconClassName (string), showIcon (boolean), and usePointerEvent (boolean). It includes details on their types, default values, and descriptions of their functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/datepicker.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| `calendarIconClassName`      | `string`                       |                 | Accepts a string that will be added as an additional CSS class to the calendar icon, allowing further styling customization.                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `showIcon`                   | `bool`                         | `true`          | Determines whether the calendar icon is displayed. Set to `true` to display the icon, and `false` to hide it. If `icon` prop is also provided, the custom icon will be displayed when `showIcon` is `true`.                                                                                                          |
| `usePointerEvent`            | `bool`                         | false           | True if Pointer Events (e.g, onPointerEnter, onPointerLeave) are used internally instead of Mouse Events (e.g, onMouseEnter, onMouseLeave).                                                                                                                                                                          |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Holiday Configuration Example in React DatePicker
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to configure holidays in the React DatePicker component using an array of date and holidayName objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/datepicker.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
holidays=[{date: '2023-08-15', holidayName:"Holiday 1"}, {date: '2023-12-31', holidayName:"Holiday 2"}]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using React Node as the Calendar Icon in React DatePicker
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to use a React component as the icon for the CalendarIcon component with a click handler.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/calendar_icon.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<CalendarIcon icon={<MyIconComponent />} onClick={myClickHandler} />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using CSS class as the Calendar Icon in React DatePicker
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use a CSS class string as the icon for the CalendarIcon component with a click handler.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/calendar_icon.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<CalendarIcon icon="my-icon-class" onClick={myClickHandler} />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing TabLoop Component in React
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to use the TabLoop component in a React application. It shows the basic structure and props of the component, which is designed to manage tabbing behavior for its children elements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/tab_loop.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: jsx
CODE:
```
<TabLoop enableTabLoop={true}>
<ChildComponent />
</TabLoop>
```

----------------------------------------

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```

| name                    | type | default value | description |
| ----------------------- | ---- | ------------- | ----------- |
| `month` (required)      |      |               |             |
| `monthNames` (required) |      |               |             |
| `onCancel` (required)   |      |               |             |
| `onChange` (required)   |      |               |             |
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs/calendar_container.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

```
# `calendar_container` (component)

| name                 | type | default value | description |
| -------------------- | ---- | ------------- | ----------- |
| `showTime`           |      | `false`       |             |
| `showTimeSelectOnly` |      | `false`       |             |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Local Development Environment for React-Datepicker
DESCRIPTION: This bash script outlines the steps to set up a local development environment for the react-datepicker project. It includes instructions for installing dependencies, linking the project, building, and running the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
1. Install/use node >=16.0.0
1. Install/use yarn >=4.6.x
1. Run `yarn link` from project root
1. Run `cd docs-site && yarn link react-datepicker`
1. Run `yarn install` from project root
1. Run `yarn build` from project root (at least the first time, this will get you the `dist` directory that holds the code that will be linked to)
1. Run `yarn start` from project root. (This command launches a documentation app and runs it as a simple webserver at http://localhost:5173.)
1. Open new terminal window
1. Run `yarn build-dev` from project root. (This command sets up a development environment that keeps an eye on any file changes. When a file is updated, it auto-builds using the latest code.)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests and Building React-Datepicker
DESCRIPTION: These commands demonstrate how to run tests and build the project after making changes. It includes instructions for rebuilding JavaScript and CSS files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
1. After each JS change run `yarn build:js` in project root
1. After each SCSS change run `yarn run css:dev && yarn run css:modules:dev` in project root
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Running React Datepicker Example with npm
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install dependencies and start the React Datepicker example application using npm. This will install all required packages and launch the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/examples/hello-world/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ npm install
$ npm start
```

TITLE: Installing and Running React Datepicker Example with Yarn
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install dependencies and start the React Datepicker example application using Yarn. This alternative to npm will also install all required packages and launch the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/examples/hello-world/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn
yarn start
```

TITLE: Formatting Git Commit Message in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to format a Git commit message with a summary and a detailed description. It shows the proper structure for commit messages, especially for larger changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git commit -m "A summary of the commit > > A paragraph describing what changed and its impact."
```

TITLE: Configuring Default Robot Access Policy
DESCRIPTION: A simple robots.txt configuration that allows all web crawlers (user agents) to access the website. The file references the standard protocol documentation and uses the wildcard user-agent to apply permissions globally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hacker0x01/react-datepicker/blob/main/docs-site/public/robots.txt#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
User-agent: *

```
